Italian erotic movie dubbed in english
If you like movie in the Joe d'amato mode you will like this..

THIS MOVIE WAS OLD SCHOOL BUT, I THINK IT WAS A MIX BETWEEN MANDINGO AND MAYBE BASIC INSTINCT!!! WELL IF I RECALL, I THINK MOVIES OF THIS NATURE CAN BE ALMOST EQUAL TO SOME PORNO'S. ALTHOUGH IF YOU LIKE PORNO'S, YOUR NOT GONNA GET PENETRATION OR GLOBS AND GLOBS OF NUT JUICE!!! HOPEFULLY YOU LIKE SLAVE PORN, AND JUST DON'T WORRY ABOUT THE LACK OF CAST. JUST TAKE A WALK ON THE WILDSIDE AND GET A HUMP OR TWO???

MALISA LONGO, STAR OF 1970'S MEAN MACHINE AND HER CAMEO IN BRUCE LEE'S "RETURN OF THE DRAGON IS A BEAUTIFUL ITALIAN ACTRESS WITH SULTRY GOOD LOOK. SHE HAS DONE ALOT OF MOVIES THAT INCLUDED NAZI EXPLOITATION,ITALIAN GANGSTER FLICK, AND EROTIC DRAMA.SHE IS LIKE THE MEGAN FOX OF THE 1970'S WHO MEETS THE EROTIC CHALLENGES OF HER FILMS.ONE OF BRUCE LEE CAMPIER MOMENT IN RETURN OF THE DRAGON IS MALISA LONGO FLIRTING WITH HIM.AS FOR THE MOVIE,"PASSION PLANTATION ", SHE IS THE BEAUTIFUL VIXEN THAT DRIVE SOUTHERN MEN CRAZY WITH HER SEXUAL APPETITE.SHE TAKE FULL CONTROL OF THE PLANTATION IN HER VERY NATURAL WAY.THE OTHER ACTOR AND ACTRESSES ARE WINDOW DRESSING COMPARED TO MALISA LONGO'S EROTICALLY CHARGE PERFORMANCE.
